channel.title: Quotes on hi!
channel.description: Recent content in Quotes on hi!

item.title: A Powerful Way to Understand the Culture
item.description: Studying how a culture manages its problems is a powerful way to understand the culture.

item.title: Work Doesn't Have to Suck
item.description: Work doesn’t have to suck. It can flow; it can be an expression of joy, an alignment toward a higher purpose.
